message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $135. This exclusive item has been valued at $120 by you, but we believe in adding a little extra value to our transactions. Thank you for considering our offer.

Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $135 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay.  I'm happy to purchase the product for $120, which is the value I placed on it.  Let me know if you're willing to accept this offer.
